forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 66 overnight. South wind 3 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. South southwest wind 14 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 44 overnight. West northwest wind 9 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
